kimtasticbush: The most free doing kundalini yoga. The least free, being around religious people, Christianity triggers me.
hippiehoodlum__: Work definitely stresses me and makes me feel boxed in, however when I’m with my plants, gardening, or enjoying my children I feel the most relaxed or free
_many_moons: Lying in my hammock by the river.
lydiahenriettao: i feel most free when writing or performing my poetry; all the parts of me engage with each other! also when dancing to music that moves me & laughing at the top of my voice 🌹

galadrielle.vf: Most free when I am in nature just enjoying the beauty around me and listening to the sounds of nature , also tbh when I make love with my boyfriend it is really something I can not explain but it is quite magic Least free basically when I am outside in public areas with a lot of people , afraid of the looks, uncomfortable in subways, supermarkets etc, also in big family reunions tbh
cquinnceyoga: I feel the most free and calm during a meditation or asana yoga practice. I am able to get out of my head and connect with my body and ground myself into Mother Earth. I am trying to work on my goals so I can leave said toxic environment and pursue my dreams of teaching yoga and nutrition! 🙌✨🙏💕
carmenomonoxide: Thank you for this beautiful prompt. I feel the most free when I'm stretching and listening to the beautiful tropical birds and feeling the steamy air in my back yard early in the morning. I've also started a new semi-secret ritual of blasting guilty pleasure music and dancing around the workshop when I'm using a paint sprayer. 😂 I feel the least free when I don't listen to my body, and force it to work without enough sleep or in uncomfortable shoes. And when I look at myself through a lense of judgement that I project others are feeling.
iyanuuu_: This sounds like some post- Us movie reflections 😂
stella_joi: When my hair is blue, the sun is on my face and the wind is in my hair. ❤️
botanical_hollow: When the earth is nice and warm I like to let my hair down and walk barefoot. Nice and simple doesn’t have to be complicated
_thehumankind: Most free: lying naked on my bed and writing, dancing or stretching, freely living trusting what feels right and expressing whatever I feel, loving what I love. Most not free: not saying something because I’m worried of people’s judgment/ worrying about judgment before checking in on what actually feels right to me.
mraybaybay: Thank you for sharing such loveliness. My honest answer to this was the last time I took a sick day a few weeks ago. I should have taken said day off about 3 days earlier... Real, REAL crying. Like my body finally thanking me for chilling the F out. Feeling necessary again soon. Thank you for reminding me to lean into these feelings. ❤️
kimlosetheweight: Most free: on vacation or like another commenter at the gym. voidm0ther: When my bills are paid and my space is clean 💫

beth.ajnayoga: Most free: in nature. Least free: at my desk!

hey.small.thing: Love this!!!! It's really worthwhile questions to ask! I need to take some time to journal on this later
marielwiley: Definitely most free when I am alone or with a person I am close to in nature, just listening to the sound of birds or waves or wind in the leaves. I feel constrained in indoor spaces that aren’t comforting or aren’t designed with care & thought
caterinaemilitas: I recently felt the most free I’ve felt in my body (without thinking of how anyone perceived me etc.) when I went my first fetish night. nat_silveria: Liberated queen!!! I feel most free when I'm working out at the gym with my favorite songs playing in my earphones, sweating and feeling my body work hard, dancing a little between sets and not giving an ef if anyone is looking at me.
